title: feed all team
body: so we decided with my friends to go play 5 against enemy all premades and feed all game.. is this bannable if we all feed?? and another question.. can i get banned for flaming my friends at customs and getting flamed back just for 4unnn

replies.body:
Intent feeding... basically. i mean it's all about if you get reported and someone activates the automated system.

Game doesn't care if you're doing it with friends, all it knows it that it happened.
What if those players wanted a nice normal game? What if someone wanted to try a new build in a normal enviornment? Short answer, yeah, bermapanned
